description.content: Freelancer für moderne Webentwicklung & digitale Lösungen
issues: Meta description is too short (< 120 characters)

keywords.content: Web Development, UX Design, Digital Marketing, Freelancer, Digital, Web Development

optimizations.recommendation: Increase meaningful text content or reduce excessive markup and scripts
optimizations.impact: Improve content quality and user experience

recommendations.recommendation: Increase touch target size to minimum 48x48px or add padding
recommendations.impact: Essential for mobile usability and accessibility

recommendations.recommendation: Optimize for mobile-specific performance budgets (LCP < 2s, TTFB < 300ms)
recommendations.impact: Critical for mobile user experience and SEO

recommendations.recommendation: Use srcset and sizes attributes for responsive images
recommendations.impact: Improves performance and visual quality across devices

recommendations.issue: Input types not optimized for mobile
recommendations.recommendation: Use appropriate input types (email, tel, number, etc.)
